GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v6.1.8
GSD.description:
mm/hugetlb: fix PTE marker handling in hugetlb_change_protection()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.8 by commit 6062c992e912df1eedad52cf64efb3d48e8d35c5, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit 60dfaad65aa97fb6755b9798a6b3c9e79bcd5930. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mm/hugetlb: fix PTE marker handling in hugetlb_change_protection()
